item.title: LEGB
item.author: vllbc
item.description: a = 'global' def outer(): # def len(in_var): # print('called my len() function: ', end="") # l = 0 # for i in in_var: # l += 1 # return l a = 'local' def inner(): nonlocal a a += ' variable' inner() print('a is', a) # print(len(a)) outer() # print(len(a)) print('a is', a) 此时为nonlocal a，会按照
